text: In 1975, then-U.S. Sen. Joe Biden opposed efforts by President Gerald Ford to aid South Vietnam and evacuate refugees.
entity_strings: 1975, Joe Biden, President Gerald Ford, South Vietnam, U.S. Sen
entities: ['1975', ' Joe Biden', ' President Gerald Ford', ' South Vietnam', ' U.S. Sen']

text: In 1975, then-U.S. Sen. Joe Biden blocked aid to South Vietnam and did not allow admittance of Vietnamese refugees into the United States.
entity_strings: Joe Biden, South Vietnam, U.S. Sen, United States, Vietnamese refugees
entities: ['Joe Biden', ' South Vietnam', ' U.S. Sen', ' United States', ' Vietnamese refugees']

text: On foreign policy, Joe Biden was against aid for Vietnam, said the fall of the Shah was a step forward for human rights in Iran, opposed Reagan's defense build-up and voted against the first Gulf War.
entity_strings: Joe Biden, Reagan, Vietnam, fall of the Shah, foreign policy, human rights in Iran, voted against the first Gulf War
entities: ['Joe Biden', ' Reagan', ' Vietnam', ' fall of the Shah', ' foreign policy', ' human rights in Iran', ' voted against the first Gulf War']
